items.name: Children's set
items.description: A set of mild curry for children, served with naan and juice. Safe for small children to eat.

items.name: Nepali Low Volume Set
items.description: A healthy, low-volume set. A great value plate that lets you enjoy a variety of flavors in a well-balanced way!

items.name: Friend special set
items.description: A luxurious set that is perfect for sharing with friends and family.

items.name: Chicken Curry
items.description: A classic curry with chunks of slow-cooked chicken. The aroma of spices will whet your appetite!

items.name: Mix Veg Curry
items.description: A healthy curry made with plenty of fresh vegetables and spices. The perfect balance of spices and vegetables is what makes it so appealing!

items.name: Keema Curry
items.description: Juicy minced meat and the aroma of spices are exquisite! A rich curry that goes perfectly with naan or rice.

items.name: Mix Dal Curry
items.description: A nutritious curry made by slowly simmering several kinds of beans. A healthy dish with an addictive creamy taste.

items.name: Mutton Curry
items.description: An authentic curry with a deep, rich flavor, with tender mutton slowly simmered in spices.

items.name: Spinach Chicken Curry (Sag Chicken Curry)
items.description: A combination of nutritious spinach and tender chicken in a creamy, mild-tasting dish.

items.name: Spinach Mutton Curry (Sag Mutton Curry)
items.description: A luxurious curry with rich spinach sauce and flavorful mutton.

items.name: Butter Chicken Curry
items.description: A delicious curry with tender chicken in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce. A popular menu item that is mildly spicy and easy to eat!

items.name: Seafood Curry
items.description: A luxurious seafood curry. A game filled with the aroma of spices and seafood!

items.name: Eggplant Chicken Curry
items.description: The soft eggplant and spicy chicken go perfectly together! This dish goes great with either naan or rice.

items.name: Green Curry
items.description: An authentic Thai flavor with the richness of coconut milk and the spicy kick of green chili peppers that will become an addictive taste.

items.name: Chicken Sandwich
items.description: A set of sandwich, French fries and cola.

items.name: Mixed Sandwich
items.description: A set of sandwich, French fries and cola.

items.name: Beef Sandwich
items.description: A set of sandwich, French fries and cola.

items.name: Chicken Sandwich (spiced)
items.description: A hearty sandwich made with juicy chicken marinated in spices and sandwiched between fragrant bread.

items.name: Chicken Snacks
items.description: This is a spicy snack made with flavorful chicken marinated in several types of spices and yogurt.

items.name: Mixed Sandwich
items.description: This sandwich is filled with colorful ingredients, allowing you to enjoy a variety of flavors.

items.name: Beef Sandwich
items.description: This is a satisfying sandwich with the delicious flavor of juicy beef filling your mouth.

items.name: Chicken Wrap
items.description: This is a simple and stylish wrap sandwich made with savory chicken and fresh vegetables wrapped in a tortilla.

items.name: Mix Wrap
items.description: These wrap sandwiches are packed with a variety of ingredients and are fun to look at.

items.name: Beef Wrap
items.description: This is a satisfying wrap sandwich packed with rich beef flavor.

items.name: Mixed Snacks
items.description: This is a colorful set of snacks that you can enjoy a little bit of, making it perfect for accompanying your drinks.

items.name: Beef Snack
items.description: This snack is packed with the delicious flavor of beef and is sure to go well with alcohol.

items.name: Chicken Kebab Bowl
items.description: This is a hearty rice bowl with spicy chicken that will whet your appetite.

items.name: Mixed Kebab Bowl
items.description: This is a great value bowl of rice that allows you to enjoy a variety of kebabs.

items.name: Beef Kebab Bowl
items.description: A bowl of rice topped with rich beef flavor and spices, giving you plenty of energy.

items.name: Chicken Sandwich
items.description: A classic and popular sandwich with juicy chicken sandwiched between soft bread.

items.name: Mixed Sandwich
items.description: This is a great value variety sandwich that allows you to enjoy a variety of flavors.

items.name: Beef Sandwich
items.description: This is a luxurious sandwich that allows you to simply enjoy the deliciousness of high-quality beef.

items.name: Tandoori Chicken (2 pieces)
items.description: Tandoori chicken marinated in spices and yogurt and slowly cooked to perfection. Crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside!

items.name: Tandoori Chicken (4 pieces)
items.description: Tandoori chicken marinated in spices and yogurt and slowly cooked to perfection. Crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside!

items.name: Chicken Tikka (2 pieces)
items.description: Boneless chicken seasoned with spices and grilled over charcoal. Goes great with beer!

items.name: Chicken Tikka (4 pieces)
items.description: Boneless chicken seasoned with spices and grilled over charcoal. Goes great with beer!

items.name: Tandoori Malai Tikka (4 pieces)
items.description: This mild-tasting chicken is marinated in Meena yogurt sauce and then baked. It's not too spicy and is easy to eat!

items.name: Tandoori Malai Tikka (2 pieces)
items.description: This mild-tasting chicken is marinated in Meena yogurt sauce and then baked. It's not too spicy and is easy to eat!

items.name: Seek Kebab (2 pieces)
items.description: A popular dish made with juicy minced meat kneaded with spices and grilled until fragrant. A very satisfying dish!

items.name: Seek Kebab (4 pieces)
items.description: A popular dish made with juicy minced meat kneaded with spices and grilled until fragrant. A very satisfying dish!

items.name: Samosa (2 pieces)
items.description: This set contains two piping hot samosas made from steaming hot potatoes and vegetables seasoned with spices wrapped in fragrant dough and deep-fried.

items.name: Momo
items.description: Nepalese-style steamed dumplings made with juicy minced meat and spices wrapped in chewy skin.

items.name: Indian Omlet
items.description: A fluffy Indian-style omelette with the aroma of several types of spices and herbs.

items.name: Fried Rice
items.description: This is an Indian fried rice made with chicken, vegetables, eggs, etc. stir-fried with spices, giving it a light and fluffy texture.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: These Indian-style French fries are crispy on the outside and soft and fluffy on the inside, with a fragrant spice flavor.

items.name: Chicken Kebab Rice Bowl
items.description: This is a satisfying rice bowl made with spicy grilled chicken kebabs served on rice and decorated with vegetables and sauce.

items.name: Chicken Kebab Roll
items.description: This easy-to-enjoy roll consists of fragrantly grilled chicken kebabs wrapped in thin bread along with vegetables.

items.name: Oolong Tea
items.description: It is a classic tea with a refreshing taste that goes well with meals.

items.name: Calpis
items.description: This is a lactic acid bacteria drink with a sweet and sour, somewhat nostalgic, gentle taste.

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: This fresh, sweet and sour juice is packed with the blessings of the sun.

items.name: Ginger Ale
items.description: A refreshing carbonated drink with a spicy ginger flavor.

items.name: Cola
items.description: This classic drink has a refreshing carbonation that will quench your thirst.
